title: #163: Watch Out For Those Conspiracy Guys | Gordon Rochford
description:
The host of the wildly popular podcast “Those Conspiracy Guys”, Gordon Rochford, stops by to discuss a wide variety of topics including the Royals and their “friends”, the Great Pyramid mystery, and how conspiracies throughout time have been suppressed by those in positions of power.

Are we any closer to solving some of these great mysteries of our past, or are we being intentionally misled by the media establishment as a way of preserving the powerful knowledge that has eluded humanity for centuries? Probably not, but the quest for knowledge is all the motivation that we need.

Earmuffs for the kids on this episode as Gordo goes off the rails but in the best way possible. The new book, HYPOCRAZY, is now available on Amazon so click the link below.
